operations.description: Register the subscription for Microsoft.SaaSHub
operations.name: Microsoft.SaaSHub/register/action

operations.description: Unregister the subscription for Microsoft.SaaSHub
operations.name: Microsoft.SaaSHub/unregister/action

operations.description: action checkNameAvailability
operations.name: Microsoft.SaaSHub/checkNameAvailability/action

operations.description: Evaluates whether the request payload can create a new resource. Currently only supports CloudService resource type.
operations.name: Microsoft.SaaSHub/canCreate/action

operations.description: read operationStatuses
operations.name: Microsoft.SaaSHub/operationStatuses/read

operations.description: write operationStatuses
operations.name: Microsoft.SaaSHub/operationStatuses/write

operations.description: read operations
operations.name: Microsoft.SaaSHub/operations/read

operations.description: Lists the SaaSHub cloud service under the subscription.
operations.name: Microsoft.SaaSHub/cloudServices/read

operations.description: Lists the SaaSHub cloud services under the resource group.
operations.name: Microsoft.SaaSHub/cloudServices/read

operations.description: Gets a SaaSHub cloud service by its ID. The operation is supported for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.
operations.name: Microsoft.SaaSHub/cloudServices/read

operations.description: Creates or updates a SaaSHub cloud service.
operations.name: Microsoft.SaaSHub/cloudServices/write

operations.description: Deletes a SaaSHub cloud service resource.
operations.name: Microsoft.SaaSHub/cloudServices/delete

operations.description: Updates the properties of a SaaSHub cloud service.
operations.name: Microsoft.SaaSHub/cloudServices/write

operations.description: Cancels a SaaSHub cloud service.
operations.name: Microsoft.SaaSHub/cloudServices/cancel/action

operations.description: Merges multiple cloud service resources into one target cloud service resource. The resource name in URL is the target, and the list of source cloud service resource and quantity will be specified in request payload
operations.name: Microsoft.SaaSHub/cloudServices/merge/action

operations.description: Evaluates whether the request payload can update an existing cloud service resource.
operations.name: Microsoft.SaaSHub/cloudServices/canUpdate/action

operations.description: Evaluates whether an existing cloud service resource can be cancelled.
operations.name: Microsoft.SaaSHub/cloudServices/canCancel/action

operations.description: Evaluates whether the source cloud service resource can be merged to target cloud service resource.
operations.name: Microsoft.SaaSHub/cloudServices/canMerge/action

operations.name: Microsoft.SaaSHub/registeredSubscriptions/read

operations.name: Microsoft.SaaSHub/locations/operationstatuses/read
